main.java

Class Continent

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.Continent

  • public class Continent
extends java.lang.Object
    Continent class holds the details about continents like its name, control value, color code, and the countries present in this continent. The countries in a particular continent are stored as a HashMap with country name as the key and related Country object references as the value. Note that the keys for HashMaps are stored in lower case.
    Author:
    Smeet
